thread.title: More all-gender restrooms available on River Campus (University of Rochester)
thread.title_full: More all-gender restrooms available on River Campus (University of Rochester) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: More all-gender restrooms available on River Campus (University of Rochester)
text: ( Source : University of Rochester ) October 16 , 2015 In an effort to further accommodate members of a diverse University community, several River Campus restrooms have been reassigned as all-gender. To date, 16 restrooms have been converted
